context: Autodesk, Inc. is a design and make software company focused on CAD, 3D design, BIM, and manufacturing software. Acquired Revit for BIM. Moving beyond traditional CAD.

competitors.name: Dassault Syst√®mes
competitors.notes: Major competitor offering CATIA, SolidWorks, and other CAD/PLM solutions for product design and engineering

competitors.name: PTC
competitors.notes: Competitor providing Pro/ENGINEER (later Creo) CAD software and product lifecycle management solutions

competitors.name: Bentley Systems
competitors.notes: Competitor in infrastructure and building design software, serving AEC (architecture, engineering, construction) markets

competitors.name: Adobe
competitors.notes: Competitor in digital media and creative software space, competing with Autodesk's media and entertainment products

competitors.name: Siemens PLM
competitors.notes: Competitor offering CAD and PLM software including NX (formerly Unigraphics) for product design and engineering

competitors.name: ANSYS
competitors.notes: Competitor in engineering simulation and analysis software that overlapped with Autodesk's engineering tools
